application.summary: A free implementation of Smalltalk Programming Language

description.p: Smalltalk is a dynamic object oriented language from the 80's. There is no primitives types, everything is represented as objects: Types, Methods, Numbers.. Everything. Is very easy to learn if you compare with C++ for instance and the code is easy to read, making Smalltalk a good choice for beginners.
You can use GNU Smalltalk on any POSIX based SO (including Linux) and Windows.
